description:
The Somatic Type class is putting on a play. But someone drops a batch of Sticky Ball candy, and it lands all over the actors! Now, since half the cast is stuck to the floor, it looks like Mikan will have to be an understudy... for the prince?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Raise the Curtain: Snow White in the Sleeping Forest
開演・眠れる森の白雪姫
